name: Path of Yao
description:
My first released Unreal Engine project; this is currently just a small demo so I can gain some insights before doing future ideas. Hope you enjoy and give some constructive feedback on the gameplay itself, as I am hoping to do something bigger down the line.

Controls:
Move left or right: Left and Right Arrow Keys
Jump: Up Arrow Key, Space Bar
Attack: A
Confirm (Menu control): Space Bar
Pause Game: Enter
